website_summaries.verdict: Fully customizable mirrors and mounting kit, so you can place the mirrors in the best place for your snowmobile.
pros: Sharp looking mirrors with a black rim and chrome accents
These oval rear view mirrors are larger than most made for snowmobiles at 3 by 6 inches
Each mirror’s stem is 6 inches in length, giving you plenty of options for positioning the mirrors
Once you have the right mounting hardware, it secures the mirror tightly to the snowmobile frame
cons: Expensive kit, especially considering you may need to buy compatible mounting hardware separately

customer_reviews.title: save yourself the headache and time, not worth it
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors won't last, the screws on the back rust and the black paint chips off. I pull them out of the packaging ready to put them on my bike and was instantly disappointed. I told the company and the sent out a replacement and again, the same thing the paint was chipped off the second pair as well. Kuryakn needs to get their stuff together, they charge top dollar and deliver below standard product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously bad-ass look for your Harley. I bought the ...
customer_reviews.text: Seriously bad-ass look for your Harley. I bought the chrome-on-chrome mirrors. In retrospect I would've purchased the ones with the black accents, but I have no complaints. Lots of visual surface area and I have had a number of complements on their look.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: They for great and I like the large size of the mirror, but hardware is starting to show corrosion after a short amount of time
customer_reviews.author: brmorris

customer_reviews.title: overall size could be better, height could be better
customer_reviews.text: overall size could be better, height could be better, on my 2016 HD Electra Glide they sit about 1.5" lower than I'd like... but still ok. Very good stability you can actually see what's behind you!
customer_reviews.author: Edfinn

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors add style and a great rear view for riders. Definitely worth every penny, glad I bought them. You can use these on metric if you purchase the adapters. Kurykan mirror adapters. Application: 2009 Vegas 8 Ball
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mirrors
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect shape and color for my new Harley. The flat black is a deep rich black which really sets then off against the deep red of the bike. Great quality as always. Field of site is great. Took a few adjustments to not have to move my arm to see everything, but once you find the right spot it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Muggs

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: Avoid the screws with a nut in the center, they easily cross thread and break. Broke two sets of mirrors trying to install. Amazon made it right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and super cool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and super cool look. These fit my 2010 HD Fat Bob even though Amazon said they wouldn't. They fit most every 1996 and later HD, but might need an adapter, which mine didn't. Check out JPCycles for fitment and adapters.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Z.

customer_reviews.title: Look awesome
customer_reviews.text: well made ...just got them on the bike have not gotten out for a ride yet..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool Mirrors!
customer_reviews.text: Love these mirrors! They are slightly wider in field of view, but not too wide to look out of place. They are perfect! Plus they are stylish to my V-Rod!
customer_reviews.author: Milton  L. Vierow

customer_reviews.title: I love em.
customer_reviews.text: I put these on three bikes now. I love em.
customer_reviews.author: William Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these mirrors for my Indian Scout Sixty. Look doubly good with the matching pegs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mirrors..
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, easy install, and good view all around. Looks great also
customer_reviews.author: Gunsl1nger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Finding good mirrors are tough these are great look good big and do the job . Very happy
customer_reviews.author: niko

customer_reviews.title: Very well made ,get ready to see things you didn't look for
customer_reviews.text: They are so big,heavy and very well made that just one of them is more than enough to see the whole world.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Sostre-Tirado

product_meta.title: Kuryakyn 1766 Motorcycle Handlebar Accessory: Heavy Industry Rear View Side Mirrors, Satin Black with Chrome Accents, 1 Pair
product_meta.description: Color:Satin Black/Chrome AccentsStems are 6in long and position mirror heads 4in above and 5-1/2in outward from mounting location. Quality and dependability only from Kuryakyn.
feature_bullets: Additional Stem and Accents Kits sold separately for a variety of customizing option
Mirror heads measure approximately 6in long x 3in wide
Includes mounting hardware for H-D applications, adapters for other applications sold separately
